ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Joes' mission into Sierra Gordo is greenlit and a team performs a HALO drop into the country. The rebels holding President Velez and the other hostages move them into an abandoned mine. Jinx and Pale Peony learn Cobra has been ordering parts from the Blue Ninjas' Revanche Electronics to fashion more sophisticated B.A.T. robot soldiers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:58:28. [CVDB427708] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:32. [Issue ID 1143317]
ComicInfo.Inker: Brian Shearer,Juan Castro,S.L. Gallant,Steve Bird,Brian Shearer,Juan Castro,Steve Bird
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: James Brown (J. Brown),Jim Rugg,Juan Castro,Larry Hama,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: B.A.T.S.,Pale Peony,Fitz,President Sofia Velez,Matthew Cooper,Haydn Strawhacker,Ernesto,Ambassador Pierce-Bryson
